title: LyondellBasell in MOU with China's Bora for $12 bln chemical investments - Nasdaq.com
text: SINGAPORE, Sept 5 (Reuters) - Chemical and fuel company LyondellBasell Industries  entered a memorandum of understanding with China'sBora Enterprise Group to build a chemical complex in northeast China, state media Xinhua reported on Thursday.
Under the MOU, the companies agreed to invest $12 billion over the next 10 years in a series of petrochemical projects in Liaoning's Panjin city.
LyondellBasell will take 50% stake in the chemical projects being built by the Chinese firm, Xinhua said.
